content: shine up an old penny is to rub it with a regarding copyright pencil eraser this is a free pattern for your personal use you are welcome to sell any items that you make thanks a very special thank you to kokopelli design but please do not sell the pattern or reproduce the text carol derbis and linden bird for graciously testing this without permission pattern 4 leaf clover side 1 backside round 1 magic_ring chain 1 6 single_crochet in the ring join to the first single_crochet with a slip_stitch 6 pull the beginning yarn-tail to close the hole work over the tail to eliminate weaving in later round 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet in each st around join 12 chain 1 to secure the end and fo note you can weave in the end now or work over it later when joining front and back side 2 front round 1 chain 6 join to the first chain with a slip_stitch to form a ring chain 1 12 single_crochet in the ring join to the first single_crochet with a slip_stitch 12 single_crochet the space red arrow formed by the last slip_stitch to join the round will be used in the next round joining round 2 chain 1 now with wrong sides together place side 1 behind hint now you can work over the remaining tail from the backside insert hook into the same joined st front and then through the corresponding st of side 1 yo pull up a loop yo and pull through to complete one single_crochet now continue joining both front and back as follows ** chain 2 2 treble_crochet in next st 2 treble_crochet in next st chain 2 single_crochet in next first leaf of the clover done repeat from ** 2 times for the 2nd and 3rd leaf now place a lucky penny or a leprechaun pic inside chain 2 2 treble_crochet in next st 2 treble_crochet in next st chain 2 single_crochet over the joined-slip-stitch space red arrow hint instead of a penny you could print a tiny picture and glue it to a circular card stock to insert inside the clover cord choose a size short loop for a key-chain fob chain 15 medium loop to hang as an ornament chain 20 long loop for a back-pack or to pull through a belt loop chain 30 slip_stitch in the first chain to form a loop join with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet fo and weave in ©
